belongs_to_collection.name: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls Collection

original_title: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls - Holidays Unwrapped
overview: My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Holidays Unwrapped is a Christmas-themed Equestria Girls special. It is the last piece of Equestria Girls content produced by DHX Media. Unlike previous specials, it is a compilation of six seven-minute shorts instead of a single hour-long story.
title: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls - Holidays Unwrapped
